static ScrollingMovementMethod * mspInstance

Detailed Description

A movement method that interprets movement keys by scrolling the text buffer. 

  EditWidget editor(this);
  MovementMethod* method = ScrollingMovementMethod::getInstance();
  editor->setMovementMethod(method);
